title: Hoops Tonight - Luka Doncic & Mavericks survive furious Warriors comeback, force Game 5
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Luka Doncic & Mavericks survive furious Warriors comeback, force Game 5
description:
Jason Timpf reacts to Luka Doncic and the Dallas Mavericks' Game 4 win over Steph Curry, Draymond Green, and the Golden State Warriors in the NBA's Western Conference Finals. Does Dallas have a chance at making a series comeback, or will the Warriors finish off the Mavericks in Game 5 at the Chase Center? #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
